data.title: Dermatologists in Atlanta, GA
data.meta_description: Georgia Dermatology Partners is home to six of the best dermatologists in the greater Atlanta region. Click here to learn more about our physicians!
data.text:
Dr. Elise Martin is a board-certified dermatologist with expertise spanning medical, cosmetic, and surgical dermatology. Dr. Martin's educational journey began at Vanderbilt University for her undergraduate studies, followed by her pursuit of a Doctor of Medicine degree at the esteemed Medical College of Georgia. She furthered her medical training with an internship in internal medicine at Greenville Memorial Hospital.

Dr. Martin's commitment to dermatology led her to a rigorous residency program at Wake Forest Baptist Health, where she honed her skills in dermatological care. Her pursuit of excellence extended to a fellowship in Cosmetic Dermatologic Surgery at Dermatology, Laser, and Vein Specialists of the Carolinas, where she received specialized training in cosmetic procedures and Mohs surgery.

A native of Lawrenceville, Georgia, Dr. Martin is thrilled to provide personalized, compassionate, and comprehensive care to her community. She places the utmost importance on patient-centric care, particularly in the realm of cosmetics, where her passion lies in enhancing patients' natural beauty at every stage of life to help them look and feel their very best.

Dr. Martinâ€™s expertise covers a wide spectrum of skincare concerns, ranging from effective acne treatments and innovative anti-aging solutions to precise skin cancer detection, removal, and Mohs Micrographic Surgery. She is also a distinguished co-investigator in multiple clinical trials involving cutting-edge cosmetic procedures and has contributed as a co-author to numerous book chapters, peer-reviewed journal publications, and a renowned textbook on cosmetic and laser medicine.

With Dr. Elise Martin, you can trust that you are in the capable hands of a dedicated dermatologist committed to helping you achieve your best skin health and aesthetics while delivering the highest standard of care.

Dr. Judah Greenberg's journey to becoming a renowned dermatologist is a testament to his dedication, expertise, and unwavering commitment to patient care. Born in Miami Beach, FL, and raised in Dallas, TX, Dr. Greenberg's passion for medicine led him to pursue his education at the University of Pennsylvania, where he completed both his college and medical school studies.

Before specializing in dermatology, Dr. Greenberg embarked on a journey of diverse medical experiences. He completed a rigorous residency in internal medicine at Emory University, gaining invaluable insights into various aspects of patient care. Dr. Greenberg's interest in dermatology was sparked during his time as a clinical research fellow in the Dermatology Clinical and Outcomes Research (DCOR) Unit at Emory, where he conducted groundbreaking research on melanoma detection and skin cancer in organ transplant recipients.

Driven by his passion for advancing dermatological care, Dr. Greenberg pursued further specialization in Mohs surgery, a highly specialized technique for removing skin cancers. Under the mentorship of Dr. Gary Monheit in Birmingham, AL, Dr. Greenberg completed a prestigious fellowship in Mohs surgery and dermatologic oncology, honing his skills in complex facial reconstructions to restore patients' natural appearance post-surgery.

Board-certified in both Dermatology and Internal Medicine, Dr. Greenberg's expertise and dedication to excellence have earned him recognition as a leader in his field. He is a proud member of esteemed organizations such as the American Academy of Dermatology, the American College of Mohs Surgery, and the American Society for Dermatologic Surgery.

Since 2017, Dr. Greenberg has been providing unparalleled dermatologic care to patients in Middle Georgia. Specializing in Mohs surgery, he has successfully treated thousands of skin cancers, earning a reputation for his surgical prowess and compassionate patient advocacy. Dr. Greenberg prioritizes achieving superior aesthetic results while ensuring patients feel comfortable and supported throughout their treatment journey.

Beyond his professional endeavors, Dr. Greenberg finds joy in family life, residing in Macon with his beloved wife and six energetic children. His commitment to excellence, coupled with his compassionate approach to patient care, makes Dr. Judah Greenberg a trusted and respected figure in the dermatology community.
